metadata.title: CVE-2023-46749 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Shiro before 1.130 or 2.0.0-alpha-4, may be susceptible to a pathtraversal attack that results in an authentication bypass when usedtogether with path rewriting Mitigation: Update to Apache Shiro 1.13.0+ or2.0.0-alpha-4+, or ensure `blockSemicolon` is enabled (this is thedefault).

criterions.comment: shiro package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
